content.text:
# Pitfall:The Last Expedition

#REDIRECT Pitfall: The Lost Expedition
Bio
Pitfall;The Last Expedition is a hit from the 1982 series, Pitfall.
The creators Activision have incorporated much, much better graphics into it than in th 1982 version along with fun new levels and new items.
Interesting Start, eh???
I find it very interesting that you start the game on the last level.
